Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 22 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Constrict, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 17 Bludgeoning plus 17 Slashing, Grapples a hit creature

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Behir makes 2 attacks, one with its bite and one to constrict
Other Actions.Action 2: Lightning Breath, The Behir exhales a line of lightning that deals an average 66 lightning damage to all creatures caught in the line
Other Actions.Action 3: Swallow, The Behir attempts to swallow a medium or smaller creature it's grappling.  A swallowed creature takes an average of 21 acid damage each turn they are trapped
